name: Girlboss Capitalism Destroyer Simulator
description:
Destroy micro-transactions at all costs. 

Girlboss Capitalism Destroyer Simulator's current release is not intended

to be assessed as a finished product. It is a proof-of-concept

first-person-shooter in which the player assumes the role of Thomas, a loose 

cannon hellbent on destroying the corrupt video games industry.

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Controls:

WASD- Move

LMB- Shoot

ESC- Exit

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Created by Team Gaslight Gatekeep Girlgame (Diana, Thomas, & Eda)

Diana - 2D/3D Artist & Level Designer

Thomas- Lead Programmer 

Eda- Musician

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

** GDA Game Jam 2022 Submission for the prompt: "In order to win, you must get rid of microtransactions" **
